scripts.build-devtools-js: browserify -t rollupify src/devtools/run.js > lib/devtools/run.js && browserify -t rollupify src/devtools/panel.js > lib/devtools/panel.js
scripts.build-js: npm run build-background-js & npm run build-devtools-js
scripts.build-html: cp src/devtools.html lib/devtools.html && cp src/panel.html lib/panel.html && cp src/first-snapshot.html lib/first-snapshot.html
scripts.build: npm run build-js & npm run build-scss & npm run build-html
